title: If you were to have died 10 years ago, what thing would you most regret having not done? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well 10 years ago I still hadn't ran into my ex love took almost 20 years. Bet 👍 wish I would pushed for it more he would of been the perfect one I would have like to have a 3 some with was even more special when he agreed . So just left now me and her again
I would have not married my spouse, seen my son’s marriage, there would be sadness and that I am grateful that I am alive!
